content: Even worse, when you take off the first third of his health, he'll stun you with electricity and then smack you around with his mace. This unavoidable cutscene actually takes off around 40% of your health, and is what we like to call a dick move.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellowbrow.md', within the main section titled 'Yellowbrow', specifically from the subsection 'Yellowbrow Boss Fight (Second Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
Even worse, when you take off the first third of his health, he'll stun you with electricity and then smack you around with his mace. This unavoidable cutscene actually takes off around 40% of your health, and is what we like to call a dick move.
